Html:
Hi, I am using Grph#.

Can I increase edge lenght and width?

Hi, what do you mean by edge lenght? Edge is drawn between vertices and it's lenght depends on the distance between them.
And the edge width can be change using StrokeThickness property of the Path object in the EdgeControl template file.

Fell free to try my GraphX for .NET - advanced WPF graph rendering library
